title: Is Kaysons Education really trustworthy? How about their doubt clearing facility? - Quora

response.answer_text: I assume that you are an aspiring JEE candidate who does not want to join coachings and all and want to study on your own. If this is your case then trust me kaysons is gonna help you a lot as they are the best in this field. So Kaysons education working pattern is divided into 3 parts - Video LecturesOnline Problem SolvingOnline Doubt Clearing SessionsVideo Lectures : These are high quality video tutorials which are very effective and come with the following advantages - Highly qualified teachers who would help you in clearing your concepts from the very basics and also look into your doubts.Interactive and interesting way of learning things. The high quality lectures help to make your lessons more and more interesting Online Problem Solving: Kaysons provides you a huge question bank to solve problems from which is’nt insanely tough but is competition specific. It’s advantages are- These problems as I said are not insanely tough like the ones given by coaching institute but focus more on strengthening your concept. JEE is a game of concept application and what is a better way of learning concept application than solving problems so Kaysons provides you with a lot of problems with varied ways of applying the same concept which comes in handy during JEE Advance.Online Doubt Clearing: This is honestly the best thing I like about Kaysons it not only provides you with a huge amount of questions but also provides you with their online solutions so that you can clear your doubts and just not get stuck in a problem. As far as ranker’s level is concerned it is for those people who have completed all the material that kaysons have provided and then they provide you with some questions which are a bit more tricky and include multiple concept application you can go there once you feel that you are thorough with your concepts and need more polishing as it has about 60 hrs of lectures and more than 1500 tips and tricks.

Trustworthy, that word generally comes when we are talking about some relation and you may be right to taking the realtionship of Coaching Institute and student to the level of trustworthiness. So let's come to your question whether it's good enough or not for a JEE aspirant.Since I have analysed the video lectures of Kaysons and even went through their few video lectures. I would like to list few of the benefits that you will get from opting for Kaysons video lectures: First of all, they have the best of the teachers teaching that you will only get in the top branch of top Coaching institute.The basics that they cover in their video lectures is the maximum of what a student can ask for in theory.The problems discussed are the perfect ones for clearing theoritical doubts as well as problematic doubts.When I say problematic it means mathematical realisation of the the theory.So considering all these aspects I can say that you can trust Kaysons for JEE preparations and with it hopefully you will crack the exam with flying colours. Coming to the second question of yours, I can surely say that Kaysons has the best doubt clearing history among all other Coaching institutes and online education providers.They will answer your doubts within a day mostly and latest by the end of next day. So, make a choice that you shouldn't regret about and hopefully that makes you knock the door of IIT
